twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 v2.02 - The Journey to 100% (Beaten K3 v1.50 100%)

message.body: Oh you replaced the title song with the full version LUL
gotta listen to it before I enter the game ofc
I also have some bad news with this grind lovey
Turns out 3 crystals were added in the extra stage
it feels so surreal to first try screen 1
50 deaths is actually pretty generous for stage 1
Forgot how much that save got nerfed, lol
enjoy the game screens are the hardest for me
the reason I haven't won yet lol
oh yeah that's the annoying jump
To think ppl used to sometimes deathless this during speedruns back then, on the unnerfed stage 1
forgot there was two spike sthere
how badly nerfed has stage 1 been?
I haven't played the game in from scratch in v1.50 in like.....
It was actually nerfed in v1.5 as well
I'll send you a few instances of 0.996 stage 1 on discord
I then downloaded the big archive at some point
which I absolutely intend to play some day
I'm a lot better at bosses than needle and it really shows here lol
that'll have to change by the time I finish this 100%
lives PB on enjoy the game
Let's not lose them all NotLikeThis
just beware I can be pretty stubborn lol
tbh I may as well try the boss again
Stage 2 is only a 50 death increase, but the average platforming is way harder lol
@Eradem I was gonna say you should probably do the intended route on enjoy the game screen 2, since that jump caused a lot of deaths
nah it was because I wasn't used to the execution primarily I think
I haven't done the screen in forever
I did it that way originally
basically when it comes tot hings I haven't done in ages Ihave a rust period
A little relieving to see you struggle here 'cause I've never beaten flandre, lol
it's another one of those havcen't played flandre in forever LUL
OF COURSE I was on the wrong side
llike they're not really that hard
removing the M-Jump is a nerf for sure lol
I have no way of knowing if that thing is going to fly overhead or on the ground
and it never did for me
not in my orignial claer either XD
okay so time for stage 2 lol
Sadly I gtg now, GL eradem! :D /
I have no memory of what the code is for this
no idea how you do this jump at all
oh it shows the lives you have left like that i see cool, good luck!
i always hated that one jump
that save is defo why this went bad haha
I've always struggled with speed gimmicks lol
this has always been a hard save for me
what is the consistent method to get across tht spike
I don't feel like there is one
macaron seems pretty bad for this
the rest of the saves aren't
align go to edge then full jump
2 of 3 aligns work and you have to press jump and right same frame
but there was a numpad strat for that too which i assume you still know
and that diagonal was what again maybe just a hold left fulljump 1 frame window
but there might also be a better  strat i forgot
macaron is very bad for this challenge lmao
100 deaths does feel enough for the stage tho
well i guess its gonna take some practice, i dont remember off the top of my head what other screens were at the end
iirc the screen after I died far in was the final one magnamity
there was one more screen after the blue screen I died on
got so annoyed I tas dropped instead
I hate these silver tower screens the most
silver tower is just ANNOYING AS HELL
every death in silver tower feels fucked
well idk it might have been align
i dont think that can subpixel kill you or anything like that
well that was easier for me that time
got golden crystal for stage 1 earlier
what's the align for walking down that
so it has to be a specific align
well you can test every alighn by not doing the trigger
now to look up what to do so I don't fail everything lol
huh. i woulda though walkoff. though i guess its just one pixel of spike of the edge and not 2
ye you can walk off with the right align
but you still need to stutter
beat levle in X amount of deaths to get it
ladybug rng is so bad lmao
I had to do stage 2 in under 100 deaths
sounds too hard for me lmao
may as well replay shine and bright a bit before doing stage 3 under 200 deaths
good luck with that as well
I was 5x over that many deaths from rz alone xd
did you play other versions of k3 before 2.02 or just this one?
I beat K3 v1.50 100% before doing v2.02
I'm one of the rare 100%ers LUL
ye I copied over my save file
Iâ€™m on my first playthrough and Iâ€™m doing 2.02
just cleared emperor as my first boss in boss rush today KomodoHype
ex emperor was the final boss I beat in v1.50 before I got credits and 100%
oh really 1st k3 playthrough there nice good luck!
Iâ€™ve seen maxifyâ€™s video of k3 100%, it looks impossible
EX Emperor is the hardest boss in v1.50 100% no question
ex emperor took me 195 hours LUL
I am not even gonna think about ex bosses
I canâ€™t even dot kid outrage yet
yea thats fine to deal with that stuff later if you want to, after beating the game normally
I spent like around 11 on normal clear
@AllenKO yeah thatâ€™s what Ima do. just try any% and maybe after if I do beat the game go back for the secrets and some skipped crystals
currently no plans for ex bosses though lmao
yeah ex bosses are something else
well the ex devas in particular, the normal ex bosses weren't so bad except for tokorotren
@Eradem I donâ€™t remember which boss that is
I just know all extra bosses look hard to me
@AllenKO wait is it the one with the health bar?
yeah tokoroten area is an ex boss and the best word to describe it is "rainbow light show"
no thehealth bar is blue area.
@Eradem I will look this up later if I remember to. It doesnâ€™t ring a bell atm
why were those wall bonks so tiny???
I think theyâ€™re made harder in phase 2
I fully avoided the wall in phase 2 cause of that
I haven't done this fight in 5 years so
it's probably not surprising I'm so rusty lol
For some reason I suck at 2 lmao
2 is one of the easier ones
not for a new player though
I got so lucky getting a 1 at the end ðŸ¤£
ayyy a gate at the end is nice
tbh the only thing I was worried about was getting the9  jup
that's the only super hard one
@Eradem no I agree but I was just really messing it up when I was doing shine and bright
it was free on j tool but I kept messing up on k3
usually outside of it the hardest I find is 6
Iâ€™m just not great with diamonds
k3 has a slightly different physics engine than jtool unfortunately
it messed me up a lot on secret 5
the 2 jump was so easy on jtool then everytime I got it on dice roll I would just die
so glad I still had the skill for shine and bright
usually I can do it easily but during the fight I just couldnâ€™t
@Eradem id expect it from someone who beat the ex bosses
the ending of boss 2 is kinda scary
I used to hate it but I'm a different skilled individual now
maybe me one day (not soon tho lmao)
took me 5 years to get here so fair LUL
yeah a lot longer than I had have thought it would take lol
I normally run it on stream like twice a week usually but in total I have 59 hours
it was 2 years for me to do everything up until EX Emperor
and then 3 more years on EX Emperor lol
2 more years on* what even was the math again, but yeah
right yeah, 3 years on exmp , 2 years on game = 5 years yeah that's right
Iâ€™ve never grinded bosses for as long as Iâ€™ve been on k3
ex emp is the hardest boss in K3 for a reason LUL
you can get very consisent at ex colonel
my consistency did get high by the end but still
20 hits per phase except for phase 8 whichi s 40 hits
oh right I saw someone streaming it for a bit recently
I'm the only one I know who was grinding it, so it was probablyme XD
I didnâ€™t talk in chat but I saw some attempts
I only beat them and got my 100% last week iirc
I used to struggle hard in phase 2. canâ€™t imagine 20 hits for it all
well I can now after beating it, but still it would take way too long for me
they super buffed phase 5 as well
if you shoot p5 at the wrong timing and wrong player position you mess up the entire pattern
and minor variations = minor variations in pattern
phase 5 is free in normal emperor
only phase I never died to lmao
yeah in ex emperor it's one of the hardest attacks
the actual hardest being right after, phase 6
I struggled a good bit with phase 4
and you can hold shoot rather than that waiting you do in p2
I might rewatch maxifyâ€™s 100% bosses again
can even watch my video for ex emperor if you like
I donâ€™t really remember too much of the extra stuff
ah ok Iâ€™ll watch it later
gonna leave rn to eat tho. was fun
Gotta figure out how to do this ledge more consistently lmao
I got the s1 & s2 golden crystals today
you got back just in time!
light show is a good way to describe that boss
tho epilepsy giving might be more accurate
i gave up on ex m-stage last save zenyahSad
the phases are a bit different from the original which explains my confusion
I'm working my way there Adrial, I will eventually be there.
I only just started v2.0 basically though
phase 4 in og is phase 5 in ex
Well, I say that, this is my v1.50 save ported over but yeee, I meant barely started the extra content.
I won't be doing EX M-Stage until it's the last thing left
oh is it? I've plyed ex emperor for so long I forgot what the phases are in regular lol
128 lives instead of 12 lives this time.
I improved vastly in just one redo
@Eradem yeah. phase 4 in ex doesnâ€™t exist in the regular emperor
I know phase 7 is exclusive to ex emperor
the machine gun attack and the little pattern before the final yeah
I'm only doing 2.0 extra content rn cause I have v1.50 100%
but now that thatâ€™s cleared. it makes sense why you said phase 5 was hard. I found it hard to read (referring to phase 4 in regular) as well
and it looks much more confusing in ex lol
in ex it's much tighter too
I've got the stage 1 & 2 golden crystals this stream adrial :D
done s1 & s2 golden so doing s3 rn
not expecting an s3 golden clear tonight
@Eradem remember my run literally 199 got it last try guy tower
i have all of them 1-4 yea
I need to practice this bit onwards for sure lol
it doesn't count the second of each one
took my a few attemps without pratice s3 was way harder
compared to guy tower? yeah 100% LUL
I have no idea how far you are in K3 lol
sure you have hades but its actually not even that bad
and s4 has a lot of filler screens that doesnt take deaths at all
don't even remember the flower traps
at least I got an old redire video I can rewatch when I don't know how to do something lmao
I really dunno how far long you are
i miss still 3 bossrush ex bosses 1 ex boss and i think one crystal before extra
yeah boss rush ex is a massive stone wall
and i probably will never do it
I've done it ofc which is why I'm even doing v2.0 extra content
yea i mean i did s4 crystal for a month or so so i try to still do stuff
you'd think the golden crystals would be stressful but they really aren't
for v2.02 100% I'm missing s3 & s4 golden crystals, the 3 new ex stage crystals, the 3 ex m-stage crystals, and the two new extra bosses.
oh and the stage 3 hidden achievement
not exactly missing a lot, literally just the v2.0 exclusive content
the only v2.0 content I've got atm is the first two goldens
and the jump and shooting achievements (not sure if I got them all yet)
right yeah clearing ex m-stage is an achievement as well
oh wow they nerfed this hard
no top spike with the two minis lol
guy tower as a save added too
not complaining given it makes golden easier lol
did they nerf guy tower itself or just add save?
i think its the same + 1 more save
oh you mean the right at the end of final save?
that corner always annoyed me anyway lol
pf not needed for the crystal with s5
you dont need to do it anyways
I don'tr really know anything about v2.0, I'm picking up info as I go
i mean i think i know the most part
there are a lot of changes that actually make this okay ish
I personally suspected a lot of the nerfs were to accomodate for golden crystals
they didn't really need to though
but i dont know kamilias mindset
also i did play 2.00 mostly without the a lot of nerfs
oh god hope the end of sliders again
ex hope the end of is so annoying
can't wait to get the crystal onthat screen /s
i mean i literally played every stage so much
nothing is really an issue anymore
most of the game I haven't played in like 4-5 years now
I was stuck on ex emperor for 3 years lmao
its been a while playing 1-3 yea
i was actually pretty good to bossrush speedruns with the old 1.50 version
when I was last doing these stages I was doing secrets and crystals
just doing the stages raw is very weird
feels weird having the skill required as well
I definitely would've game overed here
ig this is the hardest save of stage 3 for me so far
ye defo hardest on this stage for me
oh I've been doing it wrong this whole time
i mean both work the same way
I did it right like twice
I don't even know anymore lmao
you're right, you need to hold right until the screen is fully tilted and then hold left
I wasn't understanding the tilt correlation before xd
I am so bad at this it's funny
better is really go fully left to the wall and run right
always just and then move left on rejump
it never works how I expect it to
i think you just hold left to fast on the rejump
just wait a lil bit after the rejump
yeah I finally learnt it at the end
I was pressing left too early
never enjoyed hope the end of, either in normal or ex lol
I don't remembe the old screen
so don't know but sure XD
the end with the platform was a corner in 1.5
stage 3 is very much a tough stage
golden crystal is gonna be hard yea
like i said s4 is actually easier for me than s3
yeah 200 deaths seems a bit low for s3 ngl
you just farm so much deaths on some of these saves so easy
yeah this is an example of that
and than guy tower at the end
I think with my skill this is doable, I just need to practice a bit
was happy i got it with 199 without to many attempts
if i remeber correct i think i streamed it 3 times so it was like 4-5 hours or so
ye if I want this golden I need to get good at quite a few of these screens lmao
I did stages 1 & 2 without practice, just a bunchof attempts
I can feel stage 3 will be different though
oh yea it is actually hard
still missing some jumping and shooting achieevments I see
I love getting jumping and shooting achievements when I've done so much content already
I think imma call it here tonight, getting tired now and been grinding this for well, ages. XD
